overview: Cláudia and Júlia are girlfriends and live together. Cláudia gives private English lessons, Júlia takes a course and works in a clothing store. What looks like a perfect relationship turns out to be a fragile relationship, full of lies, jealousy and instability.  Through independent episodes, the webseries "Sentir" addresses youth themes, relationships, feelings, sensations, frustrations, love, losses... The generation of young people has its particularities, such as the strong connection with technology and its characteristic more detached. In such brutal times, allowing yourself to feel is an act of resistance.
title: Translúcida
